title: The Lies We Tell
description: Starting over after my father’s sudden death was bad enough, but the four boys who rule Alstone College, my new university, are determined to make my life even more difficult.Of the four, one in particular seems to be out to get me.Caiden Cavendish.Son of my estranged mother’s new husband.My shadow. My nightmare.My dad’s death was an accident... Lie.My life isn’t in danger... Lie.The Four won’t bring mayhem to my life... Lie.I don’t want Caiden Cavendish... Lie.Lies.Lies.Lies.Eeny, meeny, miny, mo.The Four are coming for you, Snow.Note: This book is not a standalone, and may contain triggers for some readers. Please view the content warnings page on the author's website for details.
author: Becca Steele
